text: Write me a story about the day the world turned upside down.
Write me a review of your favourite film, from the point of view of the main villain.
Write me a short story about what it might be like if you woke up one morning with a mermaid tail.
Write about a large box that has just been delivered to your door with your name on it. What’s inside the box and what happens when you open it?
Write me a story about what it would be like if you had an elephant as a pet.
Write a story about 1,000 gold coins suddenly appearing on your bed, what would you buy and why?
Write me a story using these 5 words: peach, buffalo, tractor, calm, harmonica
Write a letter from your future self to your present self. What would you want to tell yourself?
Write me a poem about your favorite person in the world? What do you like most about them and how do they make you feel?
Write me a story about your secret hidden super power. What can you do and why do you need to keep it hidden?
Write me three short poems about places you would like to visit someday. How do they differ and what do they have in common?
Write me a set of instructions for how to make you happy. What do we need to do in what order to get there?
Write me a story about the day you woke up and you were only an inch tall. How would your life change?
Write a newspaper article about the day that you were put in charge of the world! What laws have you passed, and how have you tried to make the world a better place?
Write me a new menu for your school lunches. If you were in charge of them, what would the choices be for your starter, main and dessert?
Write a story from the perspective of your favourite animal. What does your day to day life look like?
Dogs have taken over the world! Write me a story about your pet dog, trying to convince the other dogs that you're one of the good ones!
You're the first human to step foot on Mars! Write me a story about your first few days and what it feels like to be on a new planet.
You're a mad scientist and have invented a new vegetable. What is it called? What does it look like? What does it taste like? How can you use it in a recipe? Most importantly: Is it safe to eat?

On your walk to school one morning you notice a particularly friendly squirrel. On further investigation it's your best friend who has been turned into a squirrel! How did this happen? How can you help them?
Write me a story from the point of view of a tree, losing all its leaves in autumn. Use the five senses to help describe it!

Write me a story about a sport game, from the point of view of your favorite athletes equipment. Is it Lionel Messi's football boot, Serena Williams' tennis racket, Lewis Hamilton's Steering Wheel, or someone else?
Write me a story about your house becoming a boat. What changes, and do you like the change?
Write me a story about being granted a wish from a magic snail. What do you wish for and what are the consequences?
You've woken up one day and realised you're invisible! Write me a story about your morning.
Write me a story about a walk you're taking through the forest when one of the trees starts talking to you. What does it say? What do you do?
It's the year 3241, write me a story about your commute to school or work and the kind of transport you're using!
Write me a story from the point of view of your favourite toys when you were little. What do they think of you, what do they do when you're not around?
People are suddenly recognising you in the street, taking photos and asking for autographs. Write me a story where you're trying to work out how you've become famous!
You've just finished building a fully functioning time machine! Write a story about how you will decide what year to travel to, and what to do when you get there!
Write me a recipe for your favourite summer holiday activities.
Write a letter from one holiday character to another asking for some support. For example, Santa Clause could be asking the tooth fairy for help delivering presents!
You've just been transported into the universe of your favourite book. Is this a good thing or a very bad thing? Write me a story about your experience!
You are writing a travel guide for children coming to visit your neighborhood. What sights would you have them see,? What would you recommend to do?
Write a letter from your least favourite food, to your favourite food asking for advice on how to be better liked.
You've woken up and discovered that electricity no longer exists, and no one remembers it ever existing except you! How does your daily life change?
You are the mayor of a brand new city of your own creation! Take me on a tour down the main street, pointing out what there is to see and do in your town!
Write me a review of your favourite movie and why you think people should watch it.
You've been given a pair of magic shoes for your birthday, from a mysterious great uncle. What happens when you first put on the shoes? What do you do with these new found magical shoes?
You are the security guard at the zoo and someone has stolen the main exhibit, the rhinoceros! Write me a story about how you would track down the thief?
You have been awarded a knighthood from the queen to become a Sir or a Dame. Write me a story about what you did to get this.
Write me an interview with your favourite celebrity. What questions will you ask them and how do you think they might answer them?
You are the shopkeeper of a shop that sells lost things. Write a story about the customers you see throughout the day and what it is they are looking for.
You have become the King/Queen of Atlantis (the underwater kingdom). Write me a story about your first day as ruler.
Write me an acrostic poem for the word “seaside”. An acrostic poem is a poem in which the first letter of each line spells out a word.
Upon waking up, you have found that the acorn you planted yesterday has grown into an oak tree that is unmeasurably high! Write me a story about what happens when you decide to climb the tree.
You hear the weatherman say that it's raining cats and dogs, only to look out of the window and see that it is literally raining cats and dogs. Write me a story about what happens next!
A mad scientist is going to change you into an animal, but has given you the choice of what to pick. Write me a story about how you decide, and what happens next.

Do you have any pets at home? Write a set of instructions, from the point of view of your pet, about how to take care of them and what they would like. If you do not have a pet, what type of pet might you like?
You are the shopkeeper of a shop that only sells yellow things. Write me a story about a day in the life of working there.
Have you ever lost something that is important to you? Write me a story about where you think that thing is now.
Write a story about a boy or girl who is moving to a new school. How do you think they might feel? What do you think might be hard for them, and how could you help?
Rewrite the ending of a fairy tale of your choice. For example, what would have happened if Little Red Riding Hood never went to visit her grandma?
Write a story about your favourite teachers secret identity. What do you think they do after school has closed?
Write me an essay on what you think the writer of your favourite song was thinking about when they wrote your favourite song.
Write me a story about a day where your parents wake you up one morning and tell you they will take you to do anything you want to do for the whole day. What would you choose to do and why?
Write me a poem about your favourite ride at an amusment park. How do your five senses feel when you're on this ride?
Write me a story around these three words: secret, octopus, and sushi.
Write about and describe your favorite things to do in sand. Where is this sand? How does it feel, smell, sound like and look like?
Write me a job advert for your favourite tv character. Imagine that they are hiring a new person for that role. What would the advert be like?
Write an onomatopoeic poem, where the words you use are pronounced similar to the sound they make. For example, zing, boom, thwack, hiss and yowza!
Write me a story about the worlds longest line. What are the people queueing in this line waiting for? How do they feel? Is it worth the wait?

You've been entrusted with the worlds most top secret secret! What is the secret? Write me a story about how you would keep the secret so nobody else found out, and the trouble that might come about if someone did!
Write me a poem about your greatest strength. Why do other people admire you for it?
Write me a poem about an everyday normal weekend. Except, it's 800 years ago!
Write me a recipe for how your parents/guardians keep you safe.
